articles.title: Los Angeles Angels owner Arte Moreno exploring 'possible sale' of team
articles.description: Los Angeles Angels owner Arte Moreno, who purchased the team in 2003 for approximately $184 million, on Tuesday said that he is exploring a "possible sale" of the club.
articles.content:
Los Angeles Angels owner Arte Moreno on Tuesday said that he is exploring a "possible sale of the team."

articles.description: ABC will broadcast the NCAA women's basketball championship game for the first time, at 3 p.m. ET on April 2, 2023.
articles.content:
The NCAA women's basketball title game will be broadcast this season on ABC for the first time.

articles.title: Washington Commanders move Chase Young to reserve/PUP list; DE out at least first 4 games
articles.description: The Commanders moved defensive end Chase Young to the reserve/physically unable to perform list Monday, meaning he will miss at least the first four games of the 2022 NFL season.

articles.title: Alabama approves raise, extension for coach Nick Saban through 2030
articles.description: Alabama has approved a raise and one-year extension for head coach Nick Saban that will pay him an average of $11.7 million per year through 2030.
articles.content:
Nick Saban is once again the highest-paid football coach at a public university.

articles.title: Will Zalatoris withdraws from Tour Championship, Presidents Cup with two herniated discs
articles.description: Will Zalatoris had to withdraw from the season-ending Tour Championship because of two herniated discs in his back. He also will miss next month's Presidents Cup.
